job description:
At InnovaSystems, extraordinary solutions are born through innovative software.

A leading provider of information technology and enterprise-level solutions to the Department of Defense, federal, state and local government agencies, InnovaSystems delivers a vital service to support our nation s National Security Strategy. We engage organizational effectiveness and readiness by optimizing disparate data sources and operational systems resulting in reduced costs, increased effectiveness, and accessibility.

As a member of the InnovaSystems team, you will be empowered to do the best work of your career with challenging assignments that solve real-world problems and a steady focus on comprehensive leadership training and career growth!

InnovaSystems is looking for a junior-level Data Analyst to manage critical collection, ingestion, and publication of data that will enable the success of our next-generation DoD web applications.

This is an individual contributor position, reporting directly to the Operations Lead.

The Data Analyst will be responsible for:
  • Performing on-going, ad hoc reporting and data management for a vast & complex array of data sources for multiple projects.
  • Overseeing the accurate, timely and documented fulfillment of data and reporting requests.
  • Driving improvements to current data management process and execution activities along with development managers and product owners
Ideal candidates will possess the following attributes:
  • Intellectually curious, highly analytical, and purposefully strategic.
  • Ability to multi-task, execute quickly, and get things done.
  • Excellent interpersonal communicator with an ability to discuss complex topics at all levels of technical understanding - executives, peers, customers, and partners
  • Action-oriented, hands-on and works well with cross-functional teams across dispersed offices
  • A high integrity individual that leverages empathy, honesty, and reliability to build a strong internal circle to get stuff done
Required technical skills & experience:
  • 1-3 years of direct experience in SQL query analysis required
  • Experience with authoritative data streams, ETL/batch processes, and typical troubleshooting to resolve issues.
  • Experience creating and maintaining interface control agreements like SIA, MOU, MOA.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Ability to manage multiple and/or shifting priorities, and produce professional and accurate work product under time constraints
  • Highly-motivated, with a strong work ethic and ability to work both independently and in a group environment
  • Advanced computer skills including all MS Office applications
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Bonus points if you have:
  • Familiarity with relational databases
  • Military experience is desired
In return, InnovaSystems will invest in you! We offer training, direct mentorship, and support for growth into a more technical or managerial position from day one. We have a robust set of in-house tools to help you build, flesh out, and execute progress on the goals that matter.

Benefits & Culture
  • Flexible schedule
  • Technical and Leadership Training
  • 10 Paid Holidays
  • 3 weeks (120 hours) of paid leave annually - hours increase after 3 years of service
  • 401k Plan w/ 5% match
  • Comprehensive benefit package to include health, dental, vision and supplemental insurance plans
Varies depending on location:
  • Onsite Gym/Workout Facilities
  • Social Events
  • Contributes to community organizations; Challenged Athletes Foundation (CAF), Support the Enlisted Program (STEP), Salvation Army, Wes Wish Toy Drive
